services.name: Web Development
services.description: Builds responsive, SEO-friendly websites tailored to your business needs.

packages.name: Starter
packages.features: Includes up to 5 pages, SEO, and 3 months of support.
packages.fullDescription: Our Starter package is perfect for small businesses and startups. It includes a fully responsive design with up to 5 custom-designed pages, basic on-page SEO to improve search engine visibility, and 3 months of dedicated technical support.

packages.name: Standard
packages.features: Includes up to 10 pages, SEO, and 6 months of support.
packages.fullDescription: The Standard package is designed for growing businesses. It includes everything in the Starter package, expanded to 10 pages, with advanced SEO features, and 6 months of comprehensive support to ensure your website runs smoothly.

packages.name: Premium
packages.features: Includes up to 25 pages, SEO, and 1 year of support.
packages.fullDescription: Our Premium package offers a complete solution for established businesses. It includes up to 25 pages, advanced SEO, e-commerce functionality, and a full year of priority support, ensuring your online presence is robust and scalable.

services.name: Digital Marketing

services.name: Web Hosting

packages.name: Basic

packages.name: Professional
packages.features: 5GB Disk Space, Unlimited Bandwidth, and 5 Email Accounts.
packages.fullDescription: The Professional hosting plan is ideal for small businesses and freelancers. It offers 5GB of disk space, unmetered bandwidth, and 5 professional email accounts, giving you more room to grow.

packages.name: Business
packages.features: 25GB Disk Space, Unlimited Bandwidth, and 15 Email Accounts.
packages.fullDescription: Our Business hosting plan is designed for high-traffic websites and e-commerce stores. It comes with 25GB of disk space, unmetered bandwidth, and 15 professional email accounts, ensuring top performance and reliability.
